trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> types to UI Automation when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> is collapsed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.

The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroupItemsControl"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the value; otherwise, `null`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
